channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 00:31 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Pokrovska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover!
item.description: 🔴 00:31 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Pokrovska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 00:30 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
